channel.title: Collection Builder on The Grinnell College Digital Library Application Developer's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Collection Builder on The Grinnell College Digital Library Application Developer's Blog

item.title: Creating a Migration Collection
item.description: As we continue to look at potential migration paths for our Digital.Grinnell (DG) content, it’s become apparent that it would be nice to have a small “test” or “migration” collection of objects to play with. The collection should have a small, but diverse, set of objects covering all of the popular content, or CModel, types that we currently have in DG. Since Slack now imposes a 90-day lifespan for posts (we are using only free-tier Slack services at this time) I thought I had better create this blog post to capture key parts of a relevant Slack conversation…
